did.abstract: Tax ledger recording individual taxes owed by citizens in Orange County, N.C., for 1875.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: N.C. county whose townships in 1875 included Hillsborough, Chapel Hill, and Durham.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of a volume (204p.) of tax lists for 1875, collecting land, stocks, personal property, poll tax payment (delineated by race), and livestock values for individuals in Hillsborough (also spelled Hillsboro), Cedar Grove, Little River, Mangum, Durham, Patterson, and Chapel Hill townships. Taxable individuals are listed alphabetically within each township's section.
